messages.text: Hey team, just got off a call with Acme Corp. They're interested in the enterprise plan!
That's great news! What's their timeline?
They want to close by end of Q1. Budget is approved.
Nice! Do they need a custom demo?
Yes, they specifically asked about the API integration capabilities.
I can help with that. Let me put together some API examples for their use case.
Perfect. Can you have that ready by Thursday? The demo is Friday.
Thursday works. I'll also loop in engineering in case they have technical questions.
Should we bring up the pricing discussion? They might ask for a discount.
Good point. I'll check with finance on what discount range we can offer for annual commits.
Last enterprise deal we did 15% for 2-year commitment. That might be a good benchmark.
Thanks Mike. I'll use that as a starting point. Let's sync tomorrow morning to prep for the demo.
